name: ASDFGHJKL;
description: ASDFGHJKL; is the second major game project that I completed. ASDFGHJKL; is a rhythm game that utilizes the entire middle row of the keyboard! This game is a product of my Game Design and Development for Diverse Populations class. I learned from this project how I can make my game for a diverse amount of people, as well as how to use Gamemaker Studio 2.
